leaderboard.sqlite3-error: couldn't get karma of all objects: {e}

my-stats.opted-out: you've opted out of instakarma, so you can't see any karma stats
my-stats.top-granters-header: *Who has given me the most karma?*
my-stats.top-recipients-header: *Who have I given the most karma to?*
my-stats.your-karma-text-when-user-not-in-db: you haven't given or received any karma

db.db-created-new: created new DB at {db_path!r} using DDL {db_ddl_path!r}
db.db-exists: DB already exists at {db_path!r}, so no changes were made

error.db-backup-file-exists: error: DB backup file already exists at {db_backup_path!r}, so backup was aborted
error.connection: error: couldn't connect to database file {db_file_name!r}: {e}
error.no-db-file: error: no DB file at {db_path!r} to back up
error.rollback: error: rolled back after failed query: {statement!r} | parms: {parms!r} | error: {e}

error.could-not-add-entity: couldn't add entity with name {name!r} and user_id {user_id!r: {e}
error.could-not-add-name-and-user-id: couldn't add row with name {name!r] and user_id {user_id!r} to entities table: {e}
error.could-not-check-name: couldn't check if name {name!r} exists in 'entities' table: {e}
error.could-not-check-user-id: couldn't check if user_id {user_id!r} exists in 'entities' table: {e}
error.could-not-get-name-from-user-id: couldn't look up name for user_id {user_id!r}: {e}
error.could-not-list-opted-out: couldn't retrieve list of opted-out entities: {e}
error.could-not-set-name: couldn't set name to {name!r} for user_id of {user_id!r}: {e}

instakarma-admin.description: instakarma-admin: a set of admin tools for the instakarma bot
instakarma-admin.no-entity-exists: no user with name {name!r} exists in the DB

add-entity.command: add user or object to DB with 'opt-in' status and 0 karma (this happens automatically as users interact with instakarma-bot)
add-entity.name-var: name of the user (like '@bob') or entity (like 'python') to add

help.backup-db: make a local backup of the DB
help.list-by-karma: list all entities in descending karma order
help.list-by-name: list all entities in alphabetical order

opt-in.command: allow a user (like @bob) to give and receive karma, or an object (like python) to receive karma
opt-in.name-var: name of the user (like '@bob') or entity (like 'python') to opt in

opt-out.command: prevent a user (like @bob) from giving or receiving karma, or an object (like python) from receiving karma
opt-out.name-var: name of the user (like '@bob') or entity (like 'python') to opt out
